question:
Which among the following statements is//are correct about the Dairy Farming in the South Temperate regions?
  1. The production from the districts of Southern Hemisphere is relatively larger when compared to the dairy zones of the Northern Hemisphere.
  2. Among the countries of the Southern Hemisphere, New Zealand is the most outstanding dairying nation.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Dairy farming has developed in many areas in the Southern Hemisphere also but production from these districts is relatively smaller when compared to the large dairy zones of the Northern Hemisphere.
Among the countries of the Southern Hemisphere, New Zealand is the most outstanding dairying nation in spite of the fact that it lies farthest from the large markets of Europe.
